data.title: Heidi Klum Takes Seal's Last Name | Essence
data.meta_description: On Friday, sexy Victoria's Secret supermodel and 'Project Runway' host Heidi Klum took the last name of her equally sexy husband, soul-singer Seal. Her new legal name is Heidi Samuel.  The couple have been married for over four years and have four children together.
data.text:
Heidi Klum Takes Seal's Last Name

On Friday, sexy Victoria's Secret supermodel and 'Project Runway' host Heidi Klum took the last name of her equally sexy husband, soul-singer Seal. Her new legal name is Heidi Samuel. The couple have been married for over four years and have four children together.
